ACHS Information Technology Club

ACHS Information Technology Club aka ACHS IT Club is a club established on August 2017 by of CSIT students CSIT fourth semester students (2072 Batch) with the motto to work in boosting up student activities inside and outside of the college. With the committe from first semester to last semester students, club has been organizing various tech related or non-tech related events in the college.

Our motto “LEARN BEYOND ACADEMICS” is driving students to actively participate, learn from alumni, faculty and peers.The club works aims to build an ecosystem that encourage our students to dig into technologies through events and competitions.

Objectives

Platform for Innovation

To promote technical and managerial skills among members and provide a platform for innovation creative learning.

Promote Open Source

Encourage open source culture in the campus. The club works towards building and innovating on open source projects that keep the web open.

Workshops & Hackathons

To comduct events, programming contests, hackathons and workshops to promote advancement in the field of Computer Science.

Technology for Social Change

To engage students in social activities with a moto of “Technology for Social Change”.

Get Update with Latest Technology

To drive students to actively involve in learning emerging technologies in the area of Machine Learning, IoT, Networks and Data Science.

Improve Technical Skills

Improve and upgrade technical knowledge of students by involving them in various technological fests, competitions, seminars and workshops and thus providing them an exposure to technical world.
